name: Web-lms
tagline: A learning management system made compatible to be used for Primary, Secondary and Higher Secondary Educational Institutions in Bangladesh.
body:
### Web LMS ### An easy to use learning management system This is a learning management system, I created recently so that primary, secondary and higher secondary level educational institutions can use this site for reaching further. **This is just a prototype. I would be happy to make it evolved into something better which can be our next step to reaching students from less privileged area. But it would be nicer to have a sponsorship, little marketing to make people know about it.** Here are some screenshots: ![Web LMS Screenshots](http://imgur.com/a/pi814)
Web LMS for Bangladesh
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
